Release History¶

0.0.1 Prerelease¶

  • Still under active development as of Dec 20, 2016

Contributions¶

The project began as part of HackSeq16 (Oct. 15-17, 2016), during which the entire team (Tim Webster, Tanya Phung, Madeline Couse, Bruno Grande, Eric Karlins, Phillip Richmond, Whitney Whitford, and Melissa Wilson Sayres) contributed to the project’s conception and initial design. After the conference, Tim Webster took over responsibilities for designing, maintaining, and implementing XYalign.
